alert.note: Alert for Bamberg; Central Orangeburg; Southeastern Orangeburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Bamberg and south central Orangeburg Counties through 700 PM EDT... At 614 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Orangeburg County Airport to near Rivers Bridge State Park. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Branchville, Bowman, Rivers Bridge State Park, Ehrhardt, Rowesville and Yonder Field. This includes Interstate 26 between mile markers 153 and 160. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
